title: Who sang Things We Do For Love? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m not really sure which song is the song that you are looking for but I am going to list a few and their release date of the album that I have gotten it from https://music.apple.com/us/album/the-things-we-do-for-love/1440912379?i=14409123841976‎https://music.apple.com/us/album/things-we-do-for-love/1069913641?i=10699136492016https://music.apple.com/us/album/things-we-do-for-love/1405770177?i=14057701871992‎Things We Do for Love by Lydmor & Bon Homme2015‎Things We Do for Love by Horace Brown 1996‎Things We Do for Love (feat. JAY Z) [Remix] by Various Artists 2011 (compilation album)‎Things We Do for Love by Charles Bradley2016‎Things We Do for Love by David Crosby2016‎Things We Do for Love by Spectacular! Cast2009‎Things We Do for Love by Various Artists2015‎Lazy Sunday Afternoon by Jazzamor2002‎Things We Do for Love by Toploader2017 much more than the songs I have linked…tell me if ANY ONE IS THE ONE THAT YOU ARE LOOKING FOR AND IF THEY ARE NOT THE ONE THAT YOU ARE LOOKING FOR I CAN LITERALLY LINK MORE..WILL EDIT THE ANSWER IF YOU WANT ME TO DO IT.

"The Things We Do for Love" is a song by British band 10cc, released as a single in 1976. It later featured on the album Deceptive Bend released in 1977 and was the group's first release after the departure of band members Godley and Creme. The song was a hit in various countries worldwide, reaching number one in Canada, as well as peaking at number 6 in the UK, number 5 in the US and Australia, number 13 in the Netherlands, and number 2 in Ireland (Source: Wikipedia)
